text:
@Yamiche @NewsHour No they didn’t and still don’t. USA tops 3 million coronavirus cases this morning. 

TriState area together thanks to @NYGovCuomo @GovNedLamont and others have a plan and adjust using testing and tracing. @Lily_NEA & State Dept of Ed too! 
TRUmp:
No plan.
No leadership.
No clue.
